full_description:
Haier HWM80-M826 8 KG Top Load Fully Automatic Washing Machine

The Haier HWM80-M826 is a top-load fully automatic washing machine with a 8kg washing capacity. This Haier HWM80-M826 automatic washing machine is powered by an AC motor that ensures smooth and efficient washing performance. The Haier HWM80-M826 8 KG Top Load Fully Automatic Washing Machine also has a soft-close tempered glass lid and a durable and elegant glass lid that closes softly and safely. It also has a dispenser, which is a convenient compartment that holds the detergent and fabric softener. The dispenser automatically releases the right amount of liquid at the right time. The Haier HWM80-M826 8 KG Automatic Washing Machine has a stainless steel tub, which is a sturdy and rust-proof tub that lasts longer and cleans better. It also has an Air Dry function, which is a fast and effective drying method that uses hot air to remove moisture from the clothes. The Air Dry function saves time and energy and prevents mold and odor. The Haier HWM80-M826 8 KG Top Load Washing Machine has a Quick Wash function, which is a time-saving option that washes lightly soiled clothes in just 15 minutes. It also has a user-friendly control panel and a simple and intuitive panel that lets you choose from 8 different wash programs and 4 water levels. The control panel also has a digital display that shows the remaining time and status of the wash cycle.

Pillow Drum

The Pillow Drum is a unique drum design that has soft and smooth pillow-shaped pads. The pillow drum protects your clothes from wear and tear and reduces friction and noise. Its 560 protrusions increase its flexibility across washing. When in operation, the 720 micropores (diameter of 2.5 mm) that spray water lessen wear and speed up cleaning.

Dedicated Hijab Mode

One of the key features of this Haier HWM80-M826 washing machine is the dedicated hijab mode, which is the first dedicated hijab washing mode for Bangladesh. Its specially designed to wash delicate fabrics such as hijabs, scarves, shawls, and veils. The hijab mode uses gentle water flow and low spin speed to prevent damage and tangling of the fabrics.

Dual Magic Filter

The Haier HWM80-M826 top-load washing machine also has a Magic Filter x2, a dual-layer filter that catches lint, hair, and other impurities from the water. The Magic Filter X2 ensures a clean and hygienic wash. The innovative use of bionic design prevents waste from flowing backward, ensuring a more thorough scrap collection process.

Soft Close Tempered Glass

The gentle and gradual descent of the free-closing door prevents hand pinching and the sound of slamming. The glass lid allows you to see the washing process and adds a touch of style to your home.

Buy Haier HWM80-M826 8 KG Top Load Fully Automatic Washing Machine From Star Tech

In Bangladesh, you can get original Haier HWM80-M826 8 KG Top Load Fully Automatic Washing Machine From Star Tech. We have a large collection of latest Haier Washing Machine to purchase. Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at lowest price. The Haier HWM80-M826 8 KG Automatic Washing Machine comes with Motor: 10 Years warranty (Parts & Service: 1 Year Warranty). Haier Warranty Card must be kept for warranty claims.

full_description:
Haier HW80-IM12826TNZP 8 KG Front Load Fully Automatic Washing Machine

The Haier HW80-IM12826TNZP is a front-load fully automatic washing machine with an 8-kg washing capacity. This washing machine has a front-loading, fully automatic design to save space and energy. Their 525mm huge door can open wide and allow easy loading and unloading. The Haier HW80-IM12826TNZP Automatic Washing Machine is equipped with an inverter motor to provide powerful and stable operation and a long lifespan. The Haier washing machine also has a muscular drum with electric resistance welding technology to protect clothes from damage and reduce noise and vibration. The automatic washing machine has an ABT gasket and dispenser to prevent bacteria and mold growth and keep your clothes hygienic. The Haier HW80-IM12826TNZP 8 KG Front Load Fully Automatic Washing Machine has 16 programs and functions to suit different types of fabrics and washing needs. The Haier 8kg washing machine has a range of programs such as mix, express 15 min, wool, shirts, duvet, disinfectant, intense, self-clean, delicate/silk, heavy, underwear, baby care, daily wash, hygienic, spin, and rinse spin. It also has functions such as power, delay, i-time, temperature, spin speed, rinse, water level, and start/pause, which can allow you to customize your washing preferences and control your washing cycle.

Muscular Drum

The Haier HW80-IM12826TNZP washing machines come with a unique muscular drum that can enhance the laundry experience by ensuring better scrubbing and caring for clothes. The muscular drum has 128 muscles and drains holes on the surface, creating a gentle and effective washing action. The muscles can lift and drop the clothes repeatedly, which can remove the dirt and stains more efficiently.

High-Tech Inverter Motor

The advanced high-tech inverter motor with Haier HW80-IM12826TNZP 8kg automatic washing machine reduce vibrations and wash the clothes with extra care. The inverter motor is a brushless motor that adjusts speed and torque according to the load and cycle. The inverter motor saves energy and improves washing performance.

Near Zero Pressure Technology

One of the challenges of washing clothes is the low water pressure. This can affect the performance and efficiency of the washing machine. However, since the Haier HW80-IM12826TNZP 8kg automatic washing machine comes with Near Zero Pressure technology, this problem is solved. The Near Zero Pressure technology is an advanced feature that smartly senses the load and adjusts the water level accordingly. It ensures reliable performance and effective cleaning even at extremely low water pressures of 0.001–0.002 MPA.

ABT: Anti-Bacterial Technology

Hygiene is very important when washing clothes. The Haier HW80-IM12826TNZP 8kg automatic washing machine is equipped with ABT that is contaminated with bacteria and allergens that can cause infections and allergies. Anti-Bacterial Technology is a feature that provides a hygienic, clean, and safe wash by eliminating 99.8% of allergen microbes.

Panasonic NAS085M1 8kg Front Load Automatic Washing Machine

The Panasonic NAS085M1 8kg Front Load Automatic Washing Machine is a multifunctional and effective machine that makes doing laundry easier. With its robust universal motor and completely automatic operation, this washer/dryer can handle loads of up to 8 kg each and is ideal for households with different laundry requirements. Its cube drum design and maximum spin speed of 1400 RPM guarantee that clothing is cleaned thoroughly and gently. Operating on a power source of 220-240V and a frequency of 50Hz/60Hz, the Panasonic NAS085M1 8kg Automatic Washing Machine consumes between 1950W and 2100W of power. The washing process can be readily monitored and controlled by users thanks to the LED display, and the electromagnetic door lock assures safety while in use. With a wash ratio of 1.03, the appliance offers exceptional washing performance and a 4-star energy efficiency certification. To accommodate diverse fabric kinds and laundry preferences, it provides 16 distinct programs. Additionally, it runs silently, causing the least amount of disturbance in the home, with noise emissions as low as 62 dB during the washing and drying cycles. In general, the Panasonic NAS085M1 washing machine streamlines users' laundry experiences by combining cutting-edge technologies, effective performance, and user-friendly operation.

Panasonic NA-127XB 7kg Front Load Automatic Washing Machine

The Panasonic NA-127XB 7kg Front Load Automatic Washing Machine's fully automatic front loading design provides a practical and effective washing solution. It guarantees complete cleaning and rapid drying of garments with a 7 kg washing capacity and a 1200 RPM spin speed. With five temperature settings ranging from 20 to 90 degrees Celsius and an integrated heater, users may tailor the wash to the specific needs of the cloth and the degree of staining. The Panasonic NA-127XB 7kg Front Load Automatic Washing Machine has unique wash programs, like Aqua Fresh Wash, which uses three water flows to effectively remove stubborn stains, and Brisk Wash, which offers quick cycles. Its practical features, which preserve hygiene and prolong the life of the appliance, include Pre Wash for soaking deeply stained garments and Tub Clean for eliminating stains from the inner walls of the outer tub. The laundry can be loaded and unloaded more easily because of the 420 mm wide door, and the stainless steel tub guarantees long-lasting cleaning effectiveness. Users can effortlessly oversee and manage the washing process with the help of a digital display, and the machine uses 1900 watts of power to run energy-efficiently. In general, the Panasonic NA-127XB washing machine offers a smooth and efficient laundry experience by combining cutting-edge technology, adjustable settings, and an intuitive design.

Panasonic NA-F70B5 7kg Top Load Automatic Washing Machine

The Panasonic NA-F70B5 7kg Top Load Automatic Washing Machine is a dependable and effective option for your laundry needs. Its Dancing water flow system assures thorough cleaning, and its stainless steel tub guarantees endurance and resists rusting. It offers a greater water flow and a squeezing impact for efficient cleaning with two different strengths in the tub's rotation. full_description:
Haier HWM70-FD10829 7 KG Front Loading Washing Machine

The Haier HWM70-FD10829 is a Front Loading Washing Machine that is smart and convenient. This washing machine has a front-load, fully automatic design to save space and energy. The Haier washing machine has a 7-kg washing capacity to accommodate small to medium loads of clothes. It also has a magic door that opens wide and allows easy loading and unloading. The Haier HWM70-FD10829 Washing Machine has an add-wash feature, so add clothes or detergent during the washing cycle. It also has a muscular drum with laser-seamless welding technology, which protects your clothes from damage and reduces noise and vibration. It also has an ABT gasket and dispenser to prevent bacteria and mold growth and keep your clothes hygienic. The Haier HWM70-FD10829 Washing Machine has 14 programs and functions that can suit different types of fabrics and washing needs. It has programs such as cotton, shirts, baby care, duvet, delicate/silk, disinfection, self-clean, heavy, mix, express 15 min, sport, spin, rinse spin, and hygienic, optimal washing conditions and results. It also has functions such as delay, steam, temperature, speed, extra rinse, start/pause, customize your washing preferences, and control your washing cycle. The Haier Washing Machine also has a maximum spin speed of 1000 rpm, removing more water and reducing drying time. It also has a noise level of 56 dB (A) for washing and 75 dB (A) for spinning, ensuring a quiet and peaceful washing experience.

Super BLDC Inverter Motor

The Haier HWM70-FD10829 7 KG Front Loading Washing Machine is equipped with a super inverter motor for strong washing power, saving water and electricity.

Hijab Mode

Another great feature of the Haier HWM70-FD10829 Washing Machine is hijab mode. The first dedicated hijab washing mode has this Haier washing machine, designed to wash your tudong.

ABT: Anti-Bacterial Technology

The Haier HWM70-FD10829 Washing Machine patented Anti-bacterial Technology (ABT) can eliminate more than 99.99% of germs. The ABT is specially made with an exclusive treatment to prevent bacterial growth and create a more hygienic and clean washing environment.

full_description:
Haier HWM70-1269S5 7 KG Top Load Fully Automatic Washing Machine

The Haier HWM70-1269S5 Top Load Automatic Washing Machine has a 7 kg washing capacity that is suitable for small to medium-sized families. This automatic washing machine comes with a pillow drum design that has soft and smooth pillow-shaped pads. The pillow drum protects your clothes from wear and tear and reduces friction and noise. It also improves the washing performance and ensures a thorough and gentle wash. The Haier HWM70-1269S5 7kg Automatic Washing Machine also has Super NZP Technology, which allows the washing machine to operate effectively even at low water pressure. The Super NZP technology detects the water level and adjusts the water flow accordingly. It ensures a reliable and consistent wash even at 0.001-0.002 MPA water pressure. The Haier HWM70-1269S5 7 KG Top Load Fully Automatic Washing Machine also has an Oceanus Wave tub design to mimic the ocean waves and create a strong and dynamic water flow. The Oceanus Wave tub design enhances washing performance and removes dirt and stains from the clothes. It also has a deep-plate pulsator design that creates a powerful and deep water flow. The Deep Plate Pulsator design agitates the clothes and removes stubborn dirt and grime.

Pillow Drum

The Pillow Drum is a unique drum design that has soft and smooth pillow-shaped pads. The pillow drum protects your clothes from wear and tear and reduces friction and noise. Its 560 protrusions increase its flexibility across washing. When in operation, the 720 micropores (diameter of 2.5 mm) that spray water lessen wear and speed up cleaning.

Dual Bionic Magic Filter 

Their 2x Bionic Magic Filter has a dual-layer filter that catches lint, hair, and other impurities from the water. The Bionic Magic Filter ensures a clean and hygienic wash and prevents clogging and odor.

15 Minutes Quick Wash

Another feature of this Haier HWM70-1269S5 7kg washing machine is the Quick Wash, which is a time-saving option that washes lightly soiled clothes in just 15 minutes. The Quick Wash function saves time and energy. It also has an auto-restart function, which automatically resumes the wash cycle after a power outage or interruption.
